PAD_ShadowheartBlessed.synopsis: Shadowheart comments on feeling Shar's protection against the curse return.
PAD_ShadowheartBlessed.how_to_trigger: 1. Enter the shadow curse for the second time as shadowheart.

PAD_WantsOintment.synopsis: PAD where a character who doesn't have the ointment applied steps into the shadowcurse and considers applying some. Only triggers if someone has spare ointment in their inventory. (At least one application)Plays only if 2 or more characters present: first to speak doesn't have the ointment applied on them. SH speaks first if she can.WRITER, don't forget to update the voicebark file SCL_ShadowCurse_VB_WantsOintment if you change the structure here!
PAD_WantsOintment.how_to_trigger: After the dialog where Isobel offers you the ointment. Triggers when the party steps out of a safe area. So for example, crossing the bridge out of the Last Light area.

PAD_ShadowheartResistant.synopsis: Shadowheart comments on how she is resistant to the first layer of the curse.
PAD_ShadowheartResistant.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to SCL2. Stand in an area with the shadow curse but not with shadow blight

PAD_LightsSnuffedOut.synopsis: You're walking through an area where the shadow curse is strong and your torch gets snuffed out by the curse.
PAD_LightsSnuffedOut.how_to_trigger: Walk into a darker portion of the shadow-cursed land with a torch equipped

PAD_ShadowheartBlight.synopsis: Shadowheart comments on feeling Shar's protection fade.
PAD_ShadowheartBlight.how_to_trigger: 1. Enter the deep curse on Shadowheart while Shar's protection is active.

EmperorAD_CompanionCursed.synopsis: Used exclusively when players have a companion left unattended/unhooked and without any protection against the curse. Goes hand in hand with a switch to turn based mode.
EmperorAD_CompanionCursed.how_to_trigger: - Go into the SCL lands- Make sure a companion is unchained- Leave them to rot in the shadowcurse

PAD_ShadowheartBlessed_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ShadowheartBlessed_0.text: The Dark Lady shields me - I can feel her.
PAD_ShadowheartBlessed_0.context: NodeContext: Commenting on having divine protection from a shadow curse that affects all others

PAD_WantsOintment_2.speaker: Player
PAD_WantsOintment_2.text: Here we go - if there's any of that ointment left, I could use it.

PAD_WantsOintment_0.speaker: Player
PAD_WantsOintment_0.text: Check the bags - I think there's some left.

PAD_WantsOintment_6.speaker: Player
PAD_WantsOintment_6.text: We all should have applied it earlier.

PAD_WantsOintment_5.speaker: Player
PAD_WantsOintment_5.text: I hope there's enough to go around.

PAD_WantsOintment_4.speaker: Player
PAD_WantsOintment_4.text: Better to use it now than not use it at all.

PAD_WantsOintment_9.speaker: Player
PAD_WantsOintment_9.text: I'm not worried - I made it this far without magic ointment.

PAD_WantsOintment_8.speaker: Player
PAD_WantsOintment_8.text: Same here. I don't want to face whatever's out there unprotected.

PAD_WantsOintment_3.speaker: Player
PAD_WantsOintment_3.text: |Can I get some ointment after all?| [Shadowheart-specific node, as she might have opinions about an ointment of Selûne.]

PAD_WantsOintment_7.speaker: Player
PAD_WantsOintment_7.text: A change of heart? Good for you.

PAD_ShadowheartResistant_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ShadowheartResistant_0.text: I can feel the shadows' power here... but they don't seem to be harming me?
PAD_ShadowheartResistant_0.context: NodeContext: Some confusion. She seems to have resistance in a shadow-cursed environment  that's affecting all others.

PAD_LightsSnuffedOut_0.speaker: Player
PAD_LightsSnuffedOut_0.text: Hells. Torchlight won't last long here.

PAD_LightsSnuffedOut_1.speaker: Player
PAD_LightsSnuffedOut_1.text: Even fire is swallowed in this darkness.

PAD_LightsSnuffedOut_2.speaker: Player
PAD_LightsSnuffedOut_2.text: The curse is too strong - my torch won't stay lit.

PAD_LightsSnuffedOut_3.speaker: Player
PAD_LightsSnuffedOut_3.text: The dark's strong here - this torch is useless.

PAD_ShadowheartBlight_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ShadowheartBlight_0.text: Even Lady Shar's blessings cannot protect me here.
PAD_ShadowheartBlight_0.context: NodeContext: Commenting on losing Shar's protection against a shadow curse (venturing into where its strongest)

PAD_ShadowheartBlight_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_ShadowheartBlight_1.text: The curse bites deep here... I need to get to safety.
PAD_ShadowheartBlight_1.context: NodeContext: Commenting on losing Shar's protection against a shadow curse (venturing into where its strongest)

EmperorAD_CompanionCursed_0.text: Your ally is falling to the curse. Help them.
